sentences.en: Ability to walk, hand. Often what reason is strut?
sentences.cn: 腿脚, 手. 经常肿胀是什么原因 啊 ?

sentences.en: Check the indication of pressure gauge on central landing dear strut.
sentences.cn: 请检查中起落架减震支柱指示.

sentences.en: He got up to strut his stuff on the dance-floor.
sentences.cn: 他起身到舞池里炫耀自己的舞技。

sentences.en: He strut around like a rooster in a hen house.
sentences.cn: 他像鸡舍里的公鸡一样昂首阔步.

sentences.en: He struts around town like he owns the place.
sentences.cn: 他在城里趾高气扬地走着，好像他拥有着这地方似的。

sentences.en: High pressure air is brought through the strut and simulates the engine air flow.
sentences.cn: 高压空气通过支板引入并模拟了发动机的气流.

sentences.en: If you've got a great body, strut your stuff.
sentences.cn: 如果你的身材健美,你可以自炫一番.

sentences.en: MacPherson strut suspension system is wildly used in small cars.
sentences.cn: 麦花臣式悬吊普遍用于小车上.

sentences.en: Now we'll strut arm and arm.
sentences.cn: 这会儿咱们可以手挽着手儿,高视阔步地走了.

sentences.en: Peacocks strut in the surrounding meadow.
sentences.cn: 孔雀在周围的草地上昂首阔步。

sentences.en: Strut like walking posture, with a characteristic move head.
sentences.cn: 行走的姿态似高视阔步, 并带有特征性的点头动作.

sentences.en: Strut of knee joint of a few months after fracture, whether normal?
sentences.cn: 骨折后数月膝关节肿胀, 是否正常 呢 ?

sentences.en: Tensegrity systems , cable domes and cable - strut structures all belong to this system.
sentences.cn: 张拉整体结构 、 索穹顶结构、空间索桁张力结构等均属于索杆体系的范畴.

sentences.en: This behavior is similar to buckling of strut.
sentences.cn: 这种状态类似于压杆的屈曲.

sentences.en: To walk or move about in a spirited manner ; strut.
sentences.cn: 孔雀在草地上昂首阔步地走着.

sentences.en: Two features of folds in stratified rocks that contain strut members invite special attention.
sentences.cn: 包含在承压岩层内的成层岩石中的褶皱,有两个特点引人特别注意.

words.tran_cn: 炫耀；在…上趾高气扬地走；给…加支撑

phrases.tran_cn: 炫耀：以炫耀的方式举止或表现；炫耀
(非正式)自信而富有表现力地跳舞；（行为）炫耀

trans.tran_cn: （框架的）支杆，支柱，趾高气扬的步态，（尤指跳舞或表演时）卖弄
trans.tran_en: a long thin piece of metal or wood used to support a part of a building, the wing of an aircraft etc

trans.tran_cn: 炫耀；在…上趾高气扬地走；给…加支撑
trans.tran_en: to walk proudly with your head high and your chest pushed forwards, showing that you think you are important

trans.tran_cn: 趾高气扬地走，高视阔步
炫耀，在…上趾高气扬地走，给…加支撑
